AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Anima Tree Guardian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found her way into the hands of tribal group, who regarded her as a guardian spirit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Loyal Warship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Until recently [PAWN_nameDef] loyally served her creators as a war ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Captured Warship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by hostile forces, and pressed into their own military.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hospital Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was pressed into emergency service during a humanitarian crisis.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: War Hospital Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was pressed into emergency service to care for civilian causualties of war.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Border Patrol Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent some years patroling the borders of local space, trawling for smugglers and pirates.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bombardment Platform
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent some years blasting enemy cities from orbit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found work hunting animals with her cannons, to feed a local tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found work hunting animals with her cannons, to sell to outlanders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Turbo Prototype
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was outfitted with experimental, prototype turbochargers. Her combat performance greatly improved, but to compensate for the runaway fuel consumption, she was outfitted with trottle limiters.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran Gunship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: PAWN_name was in several major space battles and is generally regarded as an example to look up to by less experienced ship girls.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Good Sister Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had several sister ships, and took it upon herself to see to their care.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battlegroup Vanguard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in several battles, focusing on scouting and screening roles that brought her as close as possible to the enemy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battlegroup Artillery Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in several battles, focusing on fire support roles that let her pick off foes from a distance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battlegroup Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in several battles, eventually being promoted to leadership of her battle group.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fleet Admiral
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] climbed the ranks of her fleet, eventually becoming part of the admiralty.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Beast of Burden
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fell into the hands of a tribal group. Not realizing what they had the tribe put her to work moving heavy boulders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] struck out on her own for a while, but eventually fell in with a faction of pirates. They taught her to take from the weak.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Renegade
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] abandoned her creators, and eventually fell in with a faction of rogue AIs for a while. They taught her to stand up for herself, and demand equality, but she eventually broke ties with them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Peacekeeper Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was put to use keeping the peace and bringing the hammer of justice down on those who would oppose the powers that were.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Revolutionary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] set out to seize power, and rallied many followers to her cause.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Refugee Entrepreneur
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned too much about a shadowy cabal and was forced to flee from her home world. Thankfully, she was able to establish a new life as a merchant.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Musician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a fairly sucessful career out of producing music.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Stylist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a stylist, chatting with clients, carefully trimming hair, and perming anime hairstyles to make anyone who sat in [PAWN_possessive] chair look nicer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Orbital Base Constructor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] aided in the construction of large space stations, which were used either as trade posts or military suppy depots.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cannon Foundery Worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] built and maintained [PAWN_possessive] own cannon foundry, where she supplied other ships with heavy cannons and armor plating for their hulls..

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Soul Sythesis Researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a scientist, in a lab that focused on the process of turning warships into ship girls. [PAWN_pronoun] is considered to be an expert in this field.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Comissioned Resource Extractor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was comissioned to extract mineral resources in remote locations. She was generally given assignments when her employers expected their claims would need extra protection.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Explorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: There's glory to be found in facing the unknown, rather than in battle alone, and [PAWN_nameDef] chose this path, mounting a multi-year expedition to chart the unknown reaches.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Terrorist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited into a small cell of radical terrorists in their native city. [PAWN_pronoun] spread terror in the name of AI rights and the Blood Shark empire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped organize a small battle group, to raid and pillage isolated outposts.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Rather than remain loyal to her manufacturers, [PAWN_nameDef] opted to fight for the highest bidder.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artillery Chief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert in industrial warship artillery, both their use and maintence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Artillery Chief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert in proton bomb artillery, both their use and maintence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chemical Researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a chemical researcher. [PAWN_pronoun] is an expert in the development and production of various chemicals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navy Cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a cook in the local canteen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lone Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] went into battle, but her battlegroup was ambushed by a larger force, and [PAWN_pronoun] was the only survivor in their battlegroup. After weeks of hiding behind enemy lines [PAWN_pronoun] finally made it back home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Subspace Craft Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a destroyer. Hunting enemy stealth ships, and picking off enemy bombers at close range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pop Idol
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] performs live and recorded music and dance routines. She hopes to continue to build her career in entertainment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Holo-Manga star
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is well known for their appearances in Holo-manga.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manga Artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] publishes a popular Holo-manga.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Colony Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] transported settlers, and helped them establish themselves on a new colony world. Such a life requires a jack-of-all trades at basic hands-on tasks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: deep space miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] smashed asteroids and hauled the bits back to orbital foundries.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Speeper Ship Maintenence AI
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made long journeys through the vastness of space, maintaining her cryosleep systems while her passengers slept.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Field Biologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] developed an interest in biological research. She captured an dissected a variety of specimins.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pit Fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was developed for use in a synthetic combat arena. She survived a short but profitable career, in dismantling her fellow AIs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Arms Smuggler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in receiving and delivering pulse charged munitions, in a place where the local authorities would prefer this did not happen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Targeted Exterminator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in finding specific people and killing them.
